mapper.insert: insert into boke_article_message (id, content, email, name, ip, is_effective) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEffective,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update boke_article_message set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_effective = #{isEffective,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, content, email, name, ip, is_effective, gmt_created, gmt_modified from boke_article_message
